mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_sys_role t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1'

SELECT t.ID id, t.ROLE_NAME roleName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_sys_account b WHERE t.id = b.ROLE_ID) usercount, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_sys_role t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' ORDER BY t.CREATE_DATA LIMIT #{rows} OFFSET #{page}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_role ( ROLE_NAME, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATA ) VALUE ( #{roleName}, #{createUserId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sys_role SET ROLE_NAME=#{roleName}, UPDATE_USER_ID=#{updateUserId}, UPDATE_DATA=NOW() WHERE ID=#{id}
